cab.content:
(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT.)
SECRET
G.T.-2871
WAR CABINET.
GERMAN EAST AFRICAN CAMPAIGN.
(Copy of telegram dated 5.12.17 from General Vandeventer, to the Secretary of State for War)
NDANDA.
Please convey to the War Council the sincere thanks of myself and forces under me for their congratulations upon the results of the German East African Campaign. These forces have been severely tried and the War Council's expression of satisfaction with the results is very highly appreciated by all.
(Signed) GENERAL VANDEVENTER.
2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.
6th December, 1917.
